content: three cute little round nesting baskets knit bottom up with 2 strands of worsted weight wool yarn at the same time in garter stitch for texture and strength small decreases at the bottom and top of the sides give them a sturdy structure sizes small circumference 3 5″ 9 cm height 3″ 7 5 cm medium circumference 4 5″ 11 5cm height 4″ 10 cm large circumference 5 5″ 14cm height 5″ 12 5 cm
